word_mean: 大麻：大麻(Cannabis sativa L.)(大麻科)开花的干燥枝梢，含有△1-3，4-反和△6-3，4-反四氢大麻酚的使精神愉快的成分，以及大麻酚和大麻二酚。归类于致幻觉药，大麻的制成品称为bhang，ganja，hashish和marihuana。另见cannabism

sentence.Network_en: Possession of cannabis will no longer be an arrestable offence.

entry.def: Cannabis is the hemp plant when it is used as a drug.

means.word_mean: 1. any plant of the genus Cannabis; a coarse bushy annual with palmate leaves and clusters of small green flowers; yields tough fibers and narcotic drugs
2. the most commonly used illicit drug; considered a soft drug, it consists of the dried leaves of the hemp plant; smoked or chewed for euphoric effect
